content: you can dowload an ad-free pdf file here for a small fee or you can get the pattern **free on my blog** *i love reusable bags i usually take some anywhere when i m out in town for shopping that s why i created this colorful market bag * i used thistle stitch to create those beautifully textured parts which give some extra touch to the final product i used alize cotton gold batik in color 4530 and paintbox yarns cotton dk in dusty rose colorway it is a very vibrant colour choice and those colors easily brighten up a gloomy day it is an easy pattern but a bit more advanced because of the special thistle stitch used written in **us terms** only **gauge ** 5 half double crochets and 2 5 row = approx 1 inch i hope you ll enjoy this pattern as much as i did when creating it if you have any questions feel free to contact me happy crocheting
